Docs.summary: The PC/SC namespace handles smartcard reader communications and forwards requests over message queues.

remarks.para: This class library uses P/Invoke to call the native PC/SC API functions and wraps them into .Net objects. The wrapper classes are written in C#.

Currently supported systems (tested):
Operating SystemSystem library
Windows 8 (64bit) ProfessionalWinscard.dll
Ubuntu Linux 13.04 (64bit)libpcsclite.so.1
Ubuntu Linux 13.04 (32bit)libpcsclite.so.1
Windows XP/Vista (32bit) has not been tested and is therefore currently not supported!
